(enableSFBOpt, DCacheMiss).explanation: Store-to-load forwarding optimization reduces the need to access the data cache by forwarding store values directly to subsequent loads, thereby reducing data cache miss rates;

(enableSFBOpt, nDCacheMSHRs).explanation: Store-to-load forwarding optimization operates at the execution pipeline level and does not directly influence the hardware configuration of data cache Miss Status Holding Registers;

(enableSFBOpt, nL2TLBEntries).explanation: Store-to-load forwarding is a pipeline optimization technique that does not affect the hardware configuration of L2 Translation Lookaside Buffer entries;
